package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: GNU Make
package-manager.description: This is the GNU variant of make(1). The purpose of this utility is to determine automatically which pieces of a large program need to be recompiled, and issue the commands to recompile them.

package-manager.name: inst
package-manager.title: GNU Make
package-manager.description: This is the GNU variant of make(1). The purpose of this utility is to determine automatically which pieces of a large program need to be recompiled, and issue the commands to recompile them.

package-manager.description: This is the GNU variant of make(1). The purpose of this utility is to determine automatically which pieces of a large program need to be recompiled, and issue the commands to recompile them.

item.para: Remove setgid bit to allow environment variables to be passed through
